text: William Perry Jr. (May 31, 1965 â€“ August 7, 2023), better known as DJ Casper, was an American disc jockey. He was born and raised in Chicago, Illinois. He was best known for his 2000 single "Cha Cha Slide". He died of kidney and liver cancer on August 7, 2023, at the age of 58. == References == Category:1965 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American DJs Category:American dance musicians Category:Singers from Chicago
title: DJ Casper
